alert.note: Alert for Harlan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 09 at 4:05PM EST until January 10 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations ranging from a dusting in deepest valleys up to around 2 inches above 3,000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Harlan County. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 9 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and limited visibility, especially when traveling over the higher elevations such as Black Mountain. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: The latest road conditions for Kentucky can be found by visiting https://goky.ky.gov.
